column5: Hopefully this is correct Settlement Reached in CBSA Strike UPDATE 8/7/21: A tentative agreement has been reached by the Canadian Border Services Agency (CBSA) union which will bring an immediate end to the disruption it caused at Canadian ports of entry. The agreement still must be ratified by the union membership in the coming weeks but at this point that appears likely to happen. This is good news for the Covid-19 border re-opening plans that were put in jeopardy by the strike.
It still has to be ratified !
